title: Steve Deacon Story, Michelle Obama, Sheryl Underwood plus Junior and more.
itunes:title: Steve Deacon Story, Michelle Obama, Sheryl Underwood plus Junior and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve has a story about a deacon that is tied to his theme song. The Chief Love Officer advises a man with jealousy issues that he brought upon himself. Michelle Obama reveals on her podcast that she deals with a low grade form of depression tied to the current administration. Kanye and Kim are working on their marriage. Kevin Hart went to IG to express his frustrations with internet trolls. Are Sheryl Underwood and Junior Ready to Love or nah? Jonathan Isaac of the Orlando Magic tore his ACL. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve wants us to send a message to this administration that WE are not willing to tolerate this behavior anymore. VOTE!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
